TextBlock.Text: CASSAVA: Goodness, Daz, the sun is already setting on <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep's</color> horizon! What time is it? Are we late for the test?
DAZ: Fear not, Cassava: days simply pass by much quicker on this island and <color=orange>Statue Island!</color>

CASSAVA: Ah, of course! I always seem to forget. Nevertheless, we should return soon, in case time slips by us again. We have enjoyed our quiet getaway to <color=orange>Lovers' Cove</color> long enough!
DAZ: We should, indeed.. But before that, my love.
DAZ: While we are still in each other's sole company, there are a few heartfelt words I would like to say to you.
DAZ: The past few years we have spent together have been nothing short of magical.
DAZ: Your diligence and spirit brightens my darkest days. You inspire me to innovate, iterate and appreciate details to enjoy in everything we do.
DAZ: You make me feel so appreciated and loved at all times.. And I love you so, so much.
DAZ: Cassava, will you take my appendage in marriage?
CASSAVA: Daz.. I've been waiting so long to hear-
DAZ: Yes! I knew you'd say yes! Hypothesis confirmed! You said yes!!
CASSAVA: D-Daz? I haven't even given my response yet! But yes, yes! Of course I would take your appendage in marriage!
DAZ: The test was a success, Cassava! AND we're engaged! Yes!!
CASSAVA: I'm so confused.. And so happy!
DAZ: I promise to explain everything shortly, love. Come, let us write to our friends in the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station</color> through the projection wall at once!
